testcase.classname: The Hartford 'Get a Quote Auto' functionality check
testcase.name: Check that user can fill out 'About You' form. After filling out the form, the user
testcase.system-out: Given I am on The Hartford homepage.........................................passed When I enter a valid zip code on the Auto Zip Code field....................passed And I click on Start Quote button...........................................passed And I enter a "Shakir" on `First Name` field................................passed And I enter a "Jahangir" on `Last Name` field...............................passed And I enter a "1604 Spring Hill Rd" on the `Street Address` field...........passed And I enter a "302" number on `Apt or Suite` field..........................passed And I enter a "03/16/1983" on the `Date of Birth` field.....................passed And I click on `Next: Add Your Vehicle` button..............................passed Then I verify thank you text................................................passed
